master_progress_monitor.description: Consolidated monitor for all projects: ES iOS readiness, GRUBBRR sprint progress, API health, and daily summary. Posts unified status to #ai-worker-chat every 30 minutes.
checks: Check ES API health at /health endpoint
Check iOS app store readiness status

hourly_test_monitor.description: Hourly health checks for all projects. Tests API endpoints, validates iOS builds, checks website availability, and verifies n8n workflows. Logs results and alerts on failures.

daily_summary_generator.description: Comprehensive daily summary at 9 AM. Reviews all project progress, updates memory files, generates reports, and posts consolidated update to #ai-worker-chat. Includes ES status, GRUBBRR sprint progress, and system health.
tasks: Review ES project status and blockers

random_deep_research.description: Every 3 hours, run Deep Research on 10 topics from RESEARCH_QUEUE.md. Topics include architecture decisions, best practices, technology comparisons. Results saved to memory/research/. Keeps research backlog moving continuously.

metadata.consolidation_note: Consolidated from 7 jobs to 3 jobs: master_progress_monitor (merged ios_readiness + grubbrr_check + master_monitor), hourly_test_monitor (merged ios_testing + job_monitor), daily_summary_generator (merged website_worker + docs_deploy)
